title: 146: QB talk, scouting the Pro Bowl, O-Line gems
itunes:title: 146: QB talk, scouting the Pro Bowl, O-Line gems
description:
In a busy post-Christmas episode, Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks react to the injuries at quarterback for the Raiders and Titans. The duo also breaks down the play of other top QBs in the NFL and discusses why Buffalo and Minnesota may have some tough decisions to make this offseason for their signal callers. DJ and Bucky explain why it’s hard to lose drafting the best available offensive lineman and why there might be some solid free agents in that position heading into 2017.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
